name: the squared circle
description:
Who am I? Where am I? What am I? Will I ever know the truth? I don't know... but no matter what I will use my blade as a paintbrush on the canvas of this world to see as much of the truth as I can. I must square this circle.

The Squared Circle is an abstract shape-based action game set in a black and white world where you must explore the depths of your own psyche and reveal what is hidden through painting the world in red and yellow by defeating your adversaries.
